scripts.setup: ./hosting/scripts/setup.js && yarn && yarn bootstrap && yarn build && yarn dev
scripts.restore: yarn run clean && yarn run bootstrap && yarn run build
scripts.nuke: yarn run nuke:packages && yarn run nuke:docker
scripts.dev: yarn run kill-port && lerna link && lerna run --parallel dev:builder --concurrency 1
scripts.dev:noserver: lerna link && lerna run dev:stack:up && lerna run --parallel dev:builder --concurrency 1 --ignore @budibase/server --ignore @budibase/worker
scripts.lint: yarn run lint:eslint && yarn run lint:prettier
scripts.lint:fix: yarn run lint:fix:prettier && yarn run lint:fix:eslint
scripts.build:docker: lerna run build:docker && cd hosting/scripts/linux/ && ./release-to-docker-hub.sh && cd -
scripts.build:docker:staging: lerna run build:docker:staging && cd hosting/scripts/linux/ && ./release-to-docker-hub.sh staging && cd -
